name: Vans Old Skool DSM Checkerboard Black White
description: The DSM x Old Skool ‘DSM Check’ offers a subtle twist on Vans’ iconic checkerboard pattern, featuring Dover Street Market’s logo integrated into the black and white print. The grid-like pattern dominates the shoe’s canvas upper, reinforced with black suede construction on the toe, eyestay and heel. A classic white rubber midsole is accented with an Off the Wall license plate in contrasting red.
